verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice and praise the name of Jesus
To praise You brings joy to my soul.
I will rejoice and praise the name of Jesus.
To praise You brings joy to my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will rejoice because Your blood
Has purchased my salvation.
I will rejoice because Your Spirit dwells in me.
I will rejoice because my name is written down in Heaven.
I will rejoice because I'll live with You for all eternity
